definition: the fabled roc flies ten thousand miles (idiom)/one's future prospects are brilliant
Peng, large fabulous bird/roc
surname Cheng
rule/order/regulations/formula/journey/procedure/sequence
surname Wan
ten thousand/a great number
see 万俟[Mo4 qi2]

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
Li (surname)
lining/interior/inside/internal/also written 裏|里[li3]
variant of 裡|里[li3]

sentences.english: Please accept my congratulations on your success and my best wishes for your bright prospects .
sentences.chinese: 请接受我对你成功的祝贺，衷心祝你鹏程万里。

sentences.english: Please accept my congratulations on your success and my best wishes for your bright prospects.
sentences.chinese: 祝贺你之成功，衷心祝你鹏程万里，前程似锦。

sentences.english: Everything is going smoothly. luck, have a bright future. by ambition.
sentences.chinese: 一帆风顺靠运气，鹏程万里靠志气。

definition: lit. the giant Peng bird spreads its wings and begins to fly/displaying awesome power and momentum at the outset/to have the world at one's feet
to win instant success (idiom)
to have a future full of promise
bright future/bright prospects
to spread one's wings and soar (idiom)/to develop one's abilities freely
old but still full of vitality (idiom)
lit. plucking a branch of osmanthus from the Toad Palace (i.e. the moon)/fig. to succeed in the imperial examination
to have all one's wishes (idiom)/best wishes/all the best/may all your hopes be fulfilled
to win top marks in the imperial examinations
rising straight up in a clear sky (idiom); rapid promotion to a high post/meteoric career
to climb step by step/to rise steadily/on the up and up
lit. to ride the wind and crest the waves/to be ambitious and unafraid (idiom)
lit. dragon soaring and tiger leaping (idiom)/fig. prosperous and bustling/vigorous and active
to be successful in one's studies/academic success
(idiom) amiability leads to harmony
everything is going smoothly (idiom)
